OrgName.entry: TINSLEY COMMUNITY CENTRE - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: 1 hall, capacity 70. Lounge, capacity 12. Kitchen area. Only available to local groups or for childrens parties (50 children max. age range 0-9 years only, available Sat & Sun 12-7pm only). Venue no longer available for adult parties.

Telephone.entry: and answerphone, please leave a message
